elements.name: Admin logged into LMS portal and clicks attendance button on the navigation bar

Admin clicks delete button in data table row level in attendance
Alert should have "yes" button to accept in attendance

elements.name: Admin logged into LMS portal and clicks attendance button on the navigation bar

steps.name: Admin is in manage attendance page
Admin clicks delete button in data table row level in attendance
Alert should have "No" button to reject in attendance

elements.name: Admin logged into LMS portal and clicks attendance button on the navigation bar
Validate accept in alert

steps.name: Admin is in delete alert after clicking row level delete button on manage attendance page
Admin clicks yes button in alert attendance
Delete Successful message is displayed and selected attendance details are deleted from the data table

elements.name: Admin logged into LMS portal and clicks attendance button on the navigation bar
Validate reject in alert

steps.name: Admin is in delete alert after clicking row level delete button on manage attendance page
Admin clicks no button	in alert attendance
Redirected to manage attendance page and selected attendance details are not deleted from the data table

Success message is displayed and selected attendance detail are deleted from the data table

elements.name: Admin logged into LMS portal and clicks attendance button on the navigation bar

steps.name: Admin is in delete alert popup after clicking delete under header after selecting single check box in data table

elements.name: Admin logged into LMS portal and clicks attendance button on the navigation bar

steps.name: Admin is in delete alert popup after clicking delete under header after selecting single check box in data table
